events.title: Winter Turkey Shoot Classic
events.description: Traditional turkey shoot competition with Lewis Class scoring system. Entry includes lunch and door prize eligibility.
events.details: Our annual Winter Turkey Shoot features 50 targets across 5 fields with Lewis Class scoring for fair competition. Frozen turkeys awarded to class winners, hams for runners-up. Entry fee includes pulled pork lunch and soft drinks. Registration starts at 8:30 AM.

events.title: Members-Only Poker Shoot
events.description: Five stations, five cards. Best poker hand wins 60% of the pot. Re-buys allowed.
events.details: Shoot five different skeet stations, draw a card at each. $20 buy-in with unlimited re-buys. High hand takes 60%, second place 30%, third place 10%. Hot coffee and donuts provided. Members only event.

events.title: New Year Sporting Clays Championship
events.description: NSCA registered event with 100 targets across 15 stations. Multiple classes available.
events.details: Start 2025 with our challenging 100-target sporting clays course. NSCA registered event with A, B, C, D, and E classes. Hot coffee and donuts at registration. Squads depart every 30 minutes starting at 8:00 AM.

events.title: Introduction to Trap Shooting Clinic
events.description: Perfect for beginners. Learn safety, etiquette, and technique from certified instructors.
events.details: Comprehensive introduction to trap shooting including safety protocols, proper stance, target acquisition, and follow-through. Includes gun rental, 25 targets, and one-on-one instruction. Limited to 25 participants for personalized attention.

events.title: Winter Handicap Trap Championship
events.description: ATA registered handicap event with distance handicaps from 19-27 yards.
events.details: Official ATA handicap tournament with 100 targets from assigned yardages. Registration includes lunch and ATA fees. Concurrent events: 16-yard singles and doubles. Cash prizes for class winners and overall champions.

events.title: Ladies Day Fun Shoot
events.description: Ladies-only event with rotating stations, prizes, and lunch. All skill levels welcome.
events.details: Rotating stations include trap, skeet, and sporting clays. Prizes for participation, not just winning. Catered lunch included. Bring a friend for half-price entry. Gun rentals available.

events.title: Valentine's Couples Shoot
events.description: Couples team event with dinner and prizes. Fun competition format with handicapping.
events.details: Teams of two shoot together with combined scores. Handicapping ensures fair competition. Includes catered dinner, champagne toast, and prizes for top teams. Perfect for date night!

events.title: Presidents Day Marathon
events.description: All-day marathon event with trap, skeet, and sporting clays. Test your endurance and skill.
events.details: 200 total targets: 75 trap, 50 skeet, 75 sporting clays. Shoot at your own pace throughout the day. Includes breakfast, lunch, and awards dinner. Marathon completion medals for all finishers.

events.title: Youth Shooting Clinic (Ages 12-17)
events.description: Comprehensive shooting program for youth with certified instructors and safety emphasis.
events.details: NRA-certified instructors teach firearm safety, basic shooting fundamentals, and sportsmanship. Includes gun fitting, equipment selection advice, and pathway to competitive shooting. Parent/guardian must attend orientation.

events.title: Shamrock Shoot Extravaganza
events.description: St. Patrick's Day themed sporting clays event with 120 targets and Irish prizes.
events.details: NSCA registered 120-target event with Irish-themed stations. Green clothing encouraged for bonus raffle tickets. Traditional Irish lunch available. Live music and prizes throughout the day.

events.title: Spring Warm-Up Trap League
events.description: 8-week trap league starting. Teams and individuals welcome. Great for competitive practice.
events.details: Weekly trap league runs 8 weeks with 25 targets per week. Team and individual competition. Handicapping system ensures fair play. Awards banquet after season finale.

events.title: Easter Egg Hunt & Shoot
events.description: Family-friendly event with Easter egg hunt for kids and shooting activities for adults.
events.details: Easter egg hunt for children followed by family shooting activities. Bunny costume contest, face painting, and prizes. Includes ham lunch and Easter treats. Children must be accompanied by adults.

events.title: Spring Sporting Clays Classic
events.description: Premier sporting clays event with 150 targets across 15 stations. Professional course setup.
events.details: Our signature sporting clays event features 150 targets with professional course design. NSCA registered with multiple classes. Includes continental breakfast, lunch, and awards ceremony.

events.title: Youth Scholarship Fundraiser
events.description: Fundraising event for youth shooting scholarships. 100% of proceeds support local youth programs.
events.details: All proceeds benefit local youth shooting programs and scholarships. 100 trap targets with multiple entry levels. Silent auction, raffle prizes, and barbecue dinner included.

events.title: Mother's Day Appreciation Shoot
events.description: Special event honoring mothers with flowers, brunch, and fun shooting activities.
events.details: Mothers shoot free with paid adult. Includes fresh flowers, champagne brunch, and prizes. Professional photographer captures family moments. Spa gift certificates as prizes.

events.title: Memorial Day Tribute Tournament
events.description: Honoring fallen heroes with competitive shooting events and memorial ceremony.
events.details: Patriotic tournament honoring military veterans and fallen heroes. Opening ceremony with color guard, moment of silence, and national anthem. Proceeds benefit veteran organizations.

events.title: Summer Kickoff Sporting Clays
events.description: Early morning start to beat the heat. 100 targets with breakfast and awards ceremony.
events.details: Beat the summer heat with early morning start. NSCA registered 100-target event with continental breakfast at registration. Cool morning shooting followed by awards ceremony and prize distribution.

recurring_events.title: Wednesday Night Trap League
recurring_events.description: Weekly trap league for all skill levels. 25 targets per week with handicapping system.

recurring_events.title: Sunday Sporting Clays Fun Shoot
recurring_events.description: Casual sporting clays shooting with rotating course setups. No registration required.

recurring_events.title: Friday Night Skeet
recurring_events.description: Informal skeet shooting with friendly competition. Great for beginners and experts.

championships.title: Idaho State Trap Championship
championships.description: Premier trap shooting event in Idaho. ATA registered with shooters from across the Northwest.

championships.title: Northwest Sporting Clays Championship
championships.description: Regional NSCA championship featuring 200 targets over two days.
